import pandas as pd

# Load the patient note
patient_note = pd.read_csv('patient_note.csv')

# Load the clinical trial
clinical_trial = pd.read_csv('clinical_trial.csv')

# Extract the relevant columns from the patient note
patient_note = patient_note[['age', 'gender', 'medical_history', 'current_medications', 'complaints', 'recent_lab_results']]

# Extract the relevant columns from the clinical trial
clinical_trial = clinical_trial[['inclusion_criteria', 'exclusion_criteria']]

# Merge the patient note and clinical trial on the 'age' column
merged_data = pd.merge(patient_note, clinical_trial, on='age')

# Filter the merged data to only include rows where the patient meets the inclusion criteria
filtered_data = merged_data[merged_data['inclusion_criteria'] == 'yes']

# Filter the filtered data to only include rows where the patient does not meet the exclusion criteria
final_data = filtered_data[filtered_data['exclusion_criteria'] == 'no']

print(final_data)

# Output the final data
print(final_data)
